url: pfsrd://Ultimate Magic/Monsters/New Familiars/Small and Vermin Familiars/Familiar/Crab/King

sections.name: Special Abilities
sections.url: pfsrd://Ultimate Magic/Monsters/New Familiars/Small and Vermin Familiars/Familiar/Crab/King/Special Abilities

sections.body: Crabs can survive out of the water for 1 hour per point of Constitution. Beyond this limit, a crab runs the risk of suffocation, as if it were drowning.
sections.name: Water Dependency
sections.url: pfsrd://Ultimate Magic/Monsters/New Familiars/Small and Vermin Familiars/Familiar/Crab/King/Special Abilities/Water Dependency

sections.body: King crabs are small crustaceans with eight legs and two pincers or claws. Aquatic scavengers, crabs can also survive on land for some time, but must return to the water or suffocate.

name: Familiar, Crab, King
